divs: sighting detailsi was driving in 26 w okeechobee rd, hialeah, fl, united states south in the front passenger sit to miami beach for a work related issue, i was looking an airplane when i saw a cloud in the far south change from white to yellow and back to white... it look interesting so i stay looking when out of no where i started to noticing something, at first i though it was a bird... but it was coming toward my direction, as it get closer i did not notice any winds or anything related to a bird, second though in my mind was a balloon but then balloon do not stay in the same position and moving north, to my knowledge they keep going up and up but this was definitively not going up but north in the same altitude... when it was getting closer it look like a circle metallic object, the bottom part was dark so as the sun was hitting the top side... as i keep looking at the object it looks like it was hovering really low.. i was in a red light so i had some time to look at it, when i decide to tell my friend who was driving the light turn to green and we had to go, my friend try to look at it but he could not see it since he was in the driving sit and could not look up as i did. my heart started pounding really hard, i had no words for 4 to 5 minutes, i was in shock my mouth was open and i did not know what to do but keep looking, when i finally decide to tell my friend i realize that i did not had a camera... my sorry blackberry does not have a camera either so i could not take a picture, i feel so baddd that i could not have take a picture or video for the whole world to see but i think this is going to stay with me for the rest of my life. i am still in shock and wish for a seconds that i had a camera of anything so i could have taken a picture right then and there.
